title: Strengthening Artificial Intelligence Practical Competencies: Problem-Based Learning (PBL) for Higher-Order Thinking Skills (HOTS) Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational educational theory and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze and apply complex scientific terminology in language education contexts through PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities.
Learners can propose creative approaches in problem-solving projects utilizing critical thinking elements.
Learners systematically document higher-order thinking processes through peer assessment and feedback using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
